pageTitle: Final Fantasy VII/Translations - The Final Fantasy Wiki - 10 years of having more Final Fantasy information than Cid could research!
textBeforeTable: CharactersEdit [show] Contents The pirated Chinese Famicom version is not covered due to its big differences. The first two columns are the Japanese translation, followed by the Romaji. The next column is the translation used the PC versions. The PlayStation and PlayStation Network releases (available for both the PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Portable listed as PSOne Classic) presents only minor differences in the script, and the few instances where names are changed are noted in asterisks. This page lists the translations of Final Fantasy VII.
